# Enum

## Usage
`@enum [<type>]`
 
## Overview
Used to document a collection of static properties whose values are all of the same type.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @enum {String}
 */
const colors = {
    RED: "#ff0000",
    BLUE: "#0000ff",
    GREE: "#00ff00"
}
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-enum.html)**
